pbr>=1.3

PyYAML
paramiko>=2.0.1
python-daemon>=2.0.4
extras
statsd>=3.0
PrettyTable>=0.6,<0.8
# openstacksdk before 0.27.0 is TaskManager based
# 0.28.0-0.31.0 fail to upload images with glance tasks.
# 0.31.1 and 0.31.2 have a bug with image deletion in tasks API
openstacksdk>=0.27.0,!=0.28.0,!=0.29.0,!=0.30.0,!=0.31.0,!=0.31.1,!=0.31.2
diskimage-builder>=3.6.0
voluptuous
kazoo>=2.8.0
Paste
WebOb>=1.8.1
openshift<0.12.0
boto3
google-api-python-client
azure-mgmt-compute<17.0.0
azure-mgmt-network<16.0.0
azure-mgmt-resource<15.0.0
# For requests (via openstacksdk, etc.); until v2.25.0 release which fixes this
#  https://github.com/psf/requests/pull/5651
urllib3>=1.25.4,<1.26
